main.name: Brendan Frisby
main.occupation: aspiring Software Engineer and UI/UX designer
main.description: My passions are Fitness, Reading, and Tech
main.bio: I'm a recent General Assembly Software Engineering Cohort graduate looking to find work in a related field. I'm a big nerd when it comes to reading, I've read countless non-fiction books over the years on topics I enjoy. I've also been passionate about Fitness/Health for about 12 years.
main.contactmessage: Reach Out via Phone, Email, or Form Below. I'd love to hear from you!

resume.skillmessage: Javascript, Python, HTML, and CSS are my focus. I'm familiar with a wide variety of Javascript libraries, CSS frameworks and UI/UX design kits.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
